item.title: A Firefox-only minimap (2021)
item.description: - Firefox is the only browser that supports the fancy element() CSS function, allowing users to display images of arbitrary HTML elements on their page, making it unique in the market.

item.title: LazyVim
item.description: - LazyVim is a Neovim setup that allows you to easily customize and extend your configuration.

item.title: Johnson & Johnson sues researchers who linked talc to cancer
item.description: - Johnson & Johnson has filed lawsuits against four doctors who published studies linking talc-based personal care products to cancer, alleging that the studies are inaccurate and based on "junk science."

item.title: You can deactivate anyone's WhatsApp account by simply sending an email
item.description: - Twitter has implemented a new pricing structure that restricts the option to unroll tweets on the web to Premium members only.

item.title: Bad numbers in the "gzip beats BERT" paper?
item.description: - The recent paper titled "Low-Resource" Text Classification: A Parameter-Free Classification Method with Compressors by Jiang et al.

item.title: Never waste a midlife crisis
item.description: - The author shares advice about not wasting one's midlife crisis and using it as an opportunity to pursue their passions and dreams.

item.title: The Wikimedia Foundation joins Mastodon & the Fediverse
item.description: - The Wikimedia Foundation has joined Mastodon and the Fediverse.

item.title: The US economy & the EU were the same size in 2008, the US is now nearly 2X
item.description: - Twitter has implemented a new pricing structure that restricts the option of unrolling tweets on the web to Premium members only.

item.title: Coroutines for Go
item.description: - Coroutines are a way to run concurrent tasks in Go, allowing for more efficient and structured code.

item.title: The force that shapes everything around us: Parking
item.description: - Parking is a crucial but often overlooked aspect of transportation in the United States, affecting how we live, build communities, and interact with our environment.
